channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Handsome Testimonials & Reviews
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Handsome Testimonials & Reviews

item.title: CVE-2021-24492|2024-08-03T19:35:19.759Z -- unknown -- handsome%20testimonials%20%26%20reviews
item.description: The hndtst_action_instance_callback AJAX call of the Handsome Testimonials & Reviews WordPress plugin before 2.1.1, available to any authenticated users, does not sanitise, validate or escape the hndtst_previewShortcodeInstanceId POST parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to an SQL Injection issue.
